* Arkness Prime only bared her teeth behind the face-plate, the grip in her 
sword tightening.
Though she shielded her eyes from the dirt when it flew into the air, 
cursing under her breath as Megatron escaped.
Though, he was still retreating.
< I knew he would yeald, just took some time.>
Arkness sighed and watched Megatron climb aboard Astroblast, though she 
would leave him to escape.
To have him leave was enough for her, and that meant that this battle was 
getitng closer to being over.
Though, he wouldn't be leaving in such good condition next time.
THAT was a promise.*
